channel.title: CVE Feed for Harbor -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Harbor -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-20902|2024-08-02T09:21:33.417Z -- harbor -- project
item.description: A timing condition in Harbor 2.6.x and below, Harbor 2.7.2 and below, Harbor 2.8.2 and below, and Harbor 1.10.17 and below allows an attacker with network access to create jobs/stop job tasks and retrieve job task information.

item.title: CVE-2024-22261|2024-08-01T22:43:34.096Z -- harbor -- harbor
item.description: SQL-Injection in Harbor allows priviledge users to leak the task IDs

item.title: CVE-2024-22244|2024-08-01T22:43:33.635Z -- harbor -- harbor
item.description: Open Redirect in Harbor <=v2.8.4, <=v2.9.2, and <=v2.10.0 may redirect a user to a malicious site.

item.title: CVE-2024-22244|2024-06-11T18:31:37.085Z -- harbor -- harbor
item.description: Open Redirect in Harbor <=v2.8.4, <=v2.9.2, and <=v2.10.0 may redirect a user to a malicious site.

item.title: CVE-2024-22261|2024-06-10T23:25:32.158Z -- harbor -- harbor
item.description: SQL-Injection in Harbor allows priviledge users to leak the task IDs

item.title: CVE-2024-22261|2024-07-12T20:26:08.086Z -- harbor -- harbor
item.description: SQL-Injection in Harbor allows priviledge users to leak the task IDs

item.title: CVE-2024-22278|2024-08-02T00:59:55.313Z -- harbor -- harbor
item.description: Incorrect user permission validation in Harbor <v2.10.3 allows authenticated users to modify configurations.
